meanings.definition: Lacking liveliness, animation, or interest; dull
meanings.sent1: The movie's vapidness made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent2: Her vapidness conversation bored everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The vapidness of the lecture put the students to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The vapidness of the painting left the viewers feeling empty.
meanings.sent5: The vapidness of the room was palpable, sucking the energy out of the atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Showing no intelligence or thought; mindless
meanings.sent1: The vapidness expression on his face revealed his lack of understanding.
meanings.sent2: The vapidness decision to ignore the warning signs led to disaster.
meanings.sent3: Her vapidness mistake of wearing mismatched shoes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The vapidness repetition of the same mistake showed a lack of growth.
meanings.sent5: The vapidness response to the question left everyone puzzled about his knowledge.
